channel.title: Demon-Classic is back on RSCD source
channel.description:
[size=20pt][size=40pt][b][b]Demon-Classic Returns[/b][/b][/size][/size]
Hello all, Rusty & Crooks have brought back Demon Classic, based on RSCD source. Demon Classic was hosted for 1 year ago by Nemesis, and after him Zoby. Then Rusty/xEnt hosted Demon Classic with 100 people online very popular server (demonik based).
So now we have decided to bring back demon classic with new feautures and Less bugs, dupes, and we made it from scratch in RSCD source. [b] Demon Classic features:[/b]
Pk Points. Kills n deaths with k/d ratio. Points instead of exp. New stats system - read on forums. Afk room with [u]10[/u] minutes afk delay. Party system with shared EXP. New training areas, Points exchanger. Users online in client. Wilderness status in client. Slayer system. D certs, Dragon armour Sharks In Bank Small Client + WideScreen Client exist! ScreenSkill when you first login. choose your class!
[b]Current Staff:[/b] ~Admins Crooks & Rusty. @Moderators Zoby.
and much more.. if you want to know more about the features read on demon-classic forums..
[b][u]Some pictures:[/u][/b]
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/2lsy440.png[/img]
[img]http://img505.imageshack.us/img505/5693/ss20090722161741.png[/img]
[img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/3172/ss20090731195328.png[/img]
[img]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/5534/ss20090802004531.png[/img]
[img]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/3388/ss20090722162118.png[/img]
[img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/6349/ss20090722162729.png[/img] More about the skill slayer in forums..
if you want to know the commands use ::commands in-game.
Have fun!
[b]Crooks And Rusty![/b]

item.dc:creator: @Peeter_Griffin Peeter Griffin
item.description:
@Peeter_Griffin wrote:

[quote=“Kozy, post:68, topic:290410”][quote author=C R O O K S link=topic=383918.msg2893970#msg2893970 date=1249083897]
I must say Kozy i wonder which is retarded here and get more hated everyday…
Its funny though how you and mubby think your so good hackers and say to my friends that you and mubby did “Sql Injection” what a joke.
Tbh go play hacker somewhere else, there you maybe get respected, owww what am i saying, Pffft… Silly Woman maybe?
[/quote]

I never hacked you, nor did attempt to SQL Inject. It was mubby lawlz. I am not a “Hacker”, I just stated what mubby told me, and I logged in to see ppl be banned. Let’s see more attempts at “Dissing” me with your failed english.[/quote]

I heard you’ve been attacking this server according to Mubby…

7/30/2009 1:59:37 PM LAMB [c=6][b]!MubbY - G2K 2K9 Is Mine!- "I"ake a Rest Bitch[/b][/c=20] nah man 7/30/2009 1:59:46 PM [c=6][b]!MubbY - G2K 2K9 Is Mine!- "I"ake a Rest Bitch[/b][/c=20] LAMB TRUE SAY 7/30/2009 2:00:04 PM [c=6][b]!MubbY - G2K 2K9 Is Mine!- "I"ake a Rest Bitch[/b][/c=20] LAMB well yeh ill sell it to kids 7/30/2009 2:00:11 PM [c=6][b]!MubbY - G2K 2K9 Is Mine!- "I"ake a Rest Bitch[/b][/c=20] LAMB did u hear about kozy and his nets???? 7/30/2009 2:00:30 PM LAMB [c=6][b]!MubbY - G2K 2K9 Is Mine!- "I"ake a Rest Bitch[/b][/c=20] lolwut 7/30/2009 2:00:34 PM [c=6][b]!MubbY - G2K 2K9 Is Mine!- "I"ake a Rest Bitch[/b][/c=20] LAMB yh he and keith bought a net, hes hittin demon-classic atm

item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:60, topic:290410”][quote author=oksuper_ link=topic=383918.msg2896636#msg2896636 date=1249253487]

Well, pkmaster150, all i can say is your internet seems weak… i dont lag at all, an nobody else do…
No one has complain about the lagg before.

Oksuper_ this is for you, should i care? haha i laughing a java guru on mopar, post code about client GJ.

You obviously do care because there is no other point to packing it into an EXE other than to hide code to prevent reverse engineering.
[/quote]
Easy of use?

I’d still be using Excelsior JET if it was free, means idiots don’t have to setup their java paths, or even install jre. Just download, install, go.[/quote]

Well, KO9… Excelisor JET get client so big.

item.title: Demon-Classic is back on RSCD source
item.dc:creator: @Peeter_Griffin Peeter Griffin
item.description:
@Peeter_Griffin wrote:

[quote=“oksuper_, post:56, topic:290410”][quote author=Peeter Griffin link=topic=383918.msg2896787#msg2896787 date=1249258551]

How do you expect that to work if VM creation is embedded in the code?

Use the temp jar and make your own custom agent then? Execute something like -javaagent *.jar, and you have your class files.

There is no temp JAR. PS, that is NOT the syntax of the javaagent argument.

You’re telling me that jar2exe doesn’t load a temporary JAR when the executable is loaded? Yeah, that’s bullshit. However, and whatever you did, still leaves you with nothing, like I said, whatever you and your “friends” decide to do with it, I’ll know and be one step ahead.
[/quote]

LOL. Infact, it doesn’t. If you knew anything about it’s internals you’d know that it does NOT load a temporary JAR. All classes are decrypted on the fly and passed through to com.regexlabs.j2e.Jar2ExeClassLoader’s defineClass(). Funny though. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 12:22:13 am[/size][hr]But judging by this thread, you’ll deny it. Here’s proof:

[code]00401098 68 94F04200 PUSH Demon-Cl.0042F094 ; ASCII “(Ljava/lang/String;[BII)Ljava/lang/Class;”
0040109D 68 88F04200 PUSH Demon-Cl.0042F088 ; ASCII “defineClass”

[/code][/quote]

Your right I don’t, I don’t use jar2exe, I assumed it did but I guess I was wrong. Then again, I’ve never had to use jar2exe, so I wouldn’t know/care about it. You’re getting off-topic though, what’s the point of this?

Read full topic
item.source: Demon-Classic is back on RSCD source

item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“Peeter Griffin, post:55, topic:290410”][quote author=oksuper_ link=topic=383918.msg2896784#msg2896784 date=1249258324]

How do you expect that to work if VM creation is embedded in the code?

Use the temp jar and make your own custom agent then? Execute something like -javaagent *.jar, and you have your class files.

There is no temp JAR. PS, that is NOT the syntax of the javaagent argument.
[/quote]

You’re telling me that jar2exe doesn’t load a temporary JAR when the executable is loaded? Yeah, that’s bullshit. However, and whatever you did, still leaves you with nothing, like I said, whatever you and your “friends” decide to do with it, I’ll know and be one step ahead.[/quote]

LOL. Infact, it doesn’t. If you knew anything about it’s internals you’d know that it does NOT load a temporary JAR. All classes are decrypted on the fly and passed through to com.regexlabs.j2e.Jar2ExeClassLoader’s defineClass(). Funny though. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 12:22:13 am[/size][hr]But judging by this thread, you’ll deny it. Here’s proof:

[code]00401098 68 94F04200 PUSH Demon-Cl.0042F094 ; ASCII “(Ljava/lang/String;[BII)Ljava/lang/Class;”
0040109D 68 88F04200 PUSH Demon-Cl.0042F088 ; ASCII “defineClass”

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Demon-Classic is back on RSCD source
item.dc:creator: @Peeter_Griffin Peeter Griffin
item.description:
@Peeter_Griffin wrote:

[quote=“oksuper_, post:54, topic:290410”][quote author=Peeter Griffin link=topic=383918.msg2896777#msg2896777 date=1249258222]

How do you expect that to work if VM creation is embedded in the code?

Use the temp jar and make your own custom agent then? Execute something like -javaagent *.jar, and you have your class files.
[/quote]

There is no temp JAR. PS, that is NOT the syntax of the javaagent argument.[/quote]

You’re telling me that jar2exe doesn’t load a temporary JAR when the executable is loaded? Yeah, that’s bullshit. Where else do you think the VM assembles the client, out of fairy dust? However, and whatever you did, still leaves you with nothing, like I said, whatever you and your “friends” decide to do with it, I’ll know and be one step ahead.

Read full topic

@Peeter_Griffin wrote:

oksuper_:

How do you expect that to work if VM creation is embedded in the code?

Use the temp jar and make your own custom agent then? Execute something like jar cvfm *.jar, and you have your class files. Like I said, it’s just a guess, I could be completely wrong.

item.title: Demon-Classic is back on RSCD source
item.dc:creator: @Peeter_Griffin Peeter Griffin
item.description:
@Peeter_Griffin wrote:

[quote=“oksuper_, post:50, topic:290410”]Extracting classes from the VM… I guess you could call it that
BTW, what do you think I’m looking for?[/quote]

Ok, off a guess:

The infamous -javaagent .jar argument. Load all classes found in the temp jar that aren’t RT libs, etc, into another jar?

I don’t know, i’m just bluffing though. You won’t be able to do much with the client, since we both know it’ll more than likely be used for botting. Even if you somehow are successful, I’ll be able to patch it quick.

Read full topic
